alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern La Porte County through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trail Creek, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Porte. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 53. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
